data.title: Miracle
data.meta_description: Miracle is the sixth song of Good Faith. It was released on 15 November 2019 with a music video on 29 July 2020. A music video was released on 29 July 2020, starring Maisie Williams and directed by Lena Headey. Backstory: A few months ago, Lena Headey reached out about making a video for Miracle...
data.text:
I've been trying to be every man you saw in me

But in my eyes I just flicker out

And blur like ghost

Before I go, I know

Can you show me a miracle?

I wish I'd stay the night, but I've got to go to America

This could take a while

Isn't it time that I come alive?

Endless in this life that I don't know how

And so I'll come

So I'll come

Can you show me a miracle?

Can you show me a miracle?

Can you show me a miracle?

Can you show me a miracle?
